summary: This is an internal FBI email chain forwarding the official statement from the Manhattan U.S. Attorney regarding the death of defendant Jeffrey Epstein. It shows the statement being circulated among FBI personnel in New York on August 10, 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the forwarded statement from the Manhattan U.S. Attorney, announcing his death.

events.title: Death of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: The Manhattan U.S. Attorney releases a statement on the death of defendant Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The document is an FBI email chain dated August 10, 2019, forwarding the Manhattan U.S. Attorney's statement on Epstein's death.
It shows internal FBI communication regarding the need to disseminate the official statement.
The statement itself is referenced as addressing a need 'to reach out to vies' (likely meaning victims).
